title: Picture of the day: North Korea's first charity fun run
content: On a bright and sunny May Day morning, the quiet streets of the North Korean capital saw the country's first ever charity fun run. The 5k route was led by Korean guides through the city. Raising more than €2,000 for an orphanage, the run was completed by a group of approximately 50 tourists, organised by Koryo Tours. You can read more about it here
summary:
On a bright and sunny May Day morning, the quiet streets of the North Korean capital saw the country's first ever charity fun run.
The 5k route was led by Korean guides through the city.
Raising more than €2,000 for an orphanage, the run was completed by a group of approximately 50 tourists, organised by Koryo Tours.
You can read more about it here
